mapper.insert: INSERT INTO colaboradores ( nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, CURP, correoElectronico, numeroPersonal, password, idRol ) VALUES ( #{nombre}, #{apellidoPaterno}, #{apellidoMaterno}, #{CURP}, #{correoElectronico}, #{numeroPersonal}, #{password}, #{idRol} )
mapper.update: UPDATE colaboradores SET nombre = #{nombre}, apellidoPaterno = #{apellidoPaterno}, apellidoMaterno = #{apellidoMaterno}, CURP = #{CURP}, correoElectronico = #{correoElectronico}, password = #{password} WHERE idColaborador = #{idColaborador}
mapper.select: SELECT c.idColaborador, c.nombre, c.apellidoPaterno, c.apellidoMaterno, c.CURP, c.correoElectronico, c.numeroPersonal, c.password, c.idRol, r.nombre AS rol FROM colaboradores c INNER JOIN roles r ON c.idRol = r.idRol WHERE ( c.CURP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parametro}, '%') OR c.numeroPersonal LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parametro}, '%') OR c.correoElectronico LIKE CONCAT('%', #{parametro}, '%') )

SELECT c.idColaborador, c.nombre, c.apellidoPaterno, c.apellidoMaterno, c.CURP, c.correoElectronico, c.numeroPersonal, c.password, c.idRol, r.nombre AS rol FROM colaboradores c INNER JOIN roles r ON c.idRol = r.idRol WHERE c.numeroPersonal = #{parametro} OR c.correoElectronico = #{parametro} OR c.CURP = #{parametro}
SELECT idColaborador, nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, TO_BASE64(fotografia) as fotoBase64 FROM colaboradores WHERE idColaborador = #{idColaborador}
